name: Optimel
body:
### Welcome to Optimel Software Pages.
This page is devoted for our project - **Optimel: The Support System of Choice the Optimization Method**. Author provided a description of the theory and code of the product here [Wiki Optimel](https://github.com/popova-ob-77/Optimel.wiki.git).
## The purpose of the research
**The purpose of the research** - automate the process of choice of optimization method for the significantly reduce time. In software were used new methods - data structuring (binary tree of question-answer system), submission of decision trees (approximated to the natural intelligence). Can be used in production for solving applied problems, in research institutes and in schools for educational purposes. Effectively in conducting literary-patent review, because saves time and money; determines the level of scientific research; expands the number of alternatives from which choice is made; increases the user's skill level; expands outlook and reveals new research objectives.

### Release of the software Optimel 
We used for building Optimel software product the freely available Lazarus 1.6.0 - free cross-platform IDE, using a free compiler Free Pascal. The development environment is very similar and supports Delphi projects. Is used under license - GNU General Public License, GNU Lesser General Public License.
[Release](https://github.com/popova-ob-77/Optimel/releases)

### Were you can download Optimel
[GitHub](https://github.com/popova-ob-77/Optimel)

### Authors and Contributors
In 2012, Olga Popova (popova_ob@mail.ru), Boris Popov and Vladimir Kluchko developed the binary tree of questions-answers system.

In 2016, Olga Popova (popova_ob@mail.ru), Boris Popov and Dmitry Romanov developed the _Optimel: The Support System of Choice the Optimization Method_.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Software? Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/popova-ob-77/Optimel/wiki/User-guide) or e-mail: popova_ob@mail.ru and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
